question: Which country has successfully completed its maiden flight of aircraft fitted with its own high-speed satellite internet system?
explanation:
China has successfully completed its maiden flight of aircraft fitted with its own high-speed satellite internet system.
The internet system was tested on Qingdao Airlines aircraft and during its flight, passengers could access internet services at speeds higher than 100 MB at a height above 10,000 meters. China also conducted its first ever live broadcast during flight.
